info.title: What does it mean to be a local secret manager?
info.description: Local Secret Manager is the owner of an ad on Local Secrets. You can create and manage your local secret or event ads from the web platform or mobile app, through which you can increase the visibility of your establishment and get customer feedback.

step1.title: MANAGE
step1.subtitle: Create and manage your ads
step1.description: Enter the necessary information to create an ad for your local secret or event. Remember you can manage your establishment from anywhere.

step2.title: CONNECT
step2.subtitle: Respond to reviews
step2.description: Discover what your customers say about your establishment and respond to their comments at any time.

step3.title: GROW
step3.subtitle: Publish your establishment or event
step3.description: Finally, when the ad validation is complete, it will be published on the Local Secrets website and app. Remember you can always edit your ads from your profile.

testimonials.title: What our travelers say
